an5:196.8.3: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṃ tatiyo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.9.1: Yampi, bhikkhave, tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato cattāro sakuṇā nānāvaṇṇā catūhi disāhi āgantvā pādamūle nipatitvā sabbasetā sampajjiṃsu;
an5:196.9.2: cattārome, bhikkhave, vaṇṇā khattiyā brāhmaṇā vessā suddā te tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā anuttaraṃ vimuttiṃ sacchikaronti.
an5:196.9.3: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṃ catuttho mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.10.1: Yampi, bhikkhave, tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno mahato mīḷhapabbatassa uparūpari caṅkamati alippamāno mīḷhena;
an5:196.10.2: lābhī, bhikkhave, tathāgato cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ, taṃ tathāgato agathito amucchito anajjhosanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati.
an5:196.10.3: Tassa abhisambodhāya ayaṃ pañcamo mahāsupino pāturahosi.
an5:196.11.1: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato ime pañca mahāsupinā pāturahesun”ti.
an5:197.1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, vassassa antarāyā, yaṃ nemittā na jānanti, yattha nemittānaṃ cakkhu na kamati.
an5:197.1.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo vassassa antarāyo, yaṃ nemittā na jānanti, yattha nemittānaṃ cakkhu na kamati.
an5:197.2.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, upari ākāse vāyodhātu pakuppati.
an5:197.2.3: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo vassassa antarāyo, yaṃ nemittā na jānanti, yattha nemittānaṃ cakkhu na kamati.
an5:197.3.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rāhu asurindo pāṇinā udakaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mahāsamudde chaḍḍeti.
an5:197.3.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo vassassa antarāyo, yaṃ nemittā na jānanti, yattha nemittānaṃ cakkhu na kamati.
an5:197.4.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, vassavalāhakā devā pamattā honti.
an5:197.4.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho vassassa antarāyo, yaṃ nemittā na jānanti, yattha nemittānaṃ cakkhu na kamati.
an5:197.5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, manussā adhammikā honti.
an5:197.5.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo vassassa antarāyo, yaṃ nemittā na jānanti, yattha nemittānaṃ cakkhu na kamati.
an5:197.5.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca vassassa antarāyā, yaṃ nemittā na jānanti, yattha nemittānaṃ cakkhu na kamatī”ti.
an5:198.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnaṃ.
an5:198.1.3: Kālena ca bhāsitā hoti, saccā ca bhāsitā hoti, saṇhā ca bhāsitā hoti, atthasaṃhitā ca bhāsitā hoti, mettacittena ca bhāsitā hoti.
an5:198.1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnan”ti.
an5:199.1.1: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavanto pabbajitā kulaṃ upasaṅkamanti, tattha manussā pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti.
an5:199.1.3: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṃ upasaṅkamante manussā disvā cittāni pasādenti, saggasaṃvattanikaṃ, bhikkhave, taṃ kulaṃ tasmiṃ samaye paṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ hoti.
an5:199.2.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṃ upasaṅkamante manussā paccuṭṭhenti abhivādenti āsanaṃ denti, uccākulīnasaṃvattanikaṃ, bhikkhave, taṃ kulaṃ tasmiṃ samaye paṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ hoti.
an5:199.3.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṃ upasaṅkamante manussā maccheramalaṃ paṭivinenti, mahesakkhasaṃvattanikaṃ, bhikkhave, taṃ kulaṃ tasmiṃ samaye paṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ hoti.
an5:199.4.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṃ upasaṅkamante manussā yathāsatti yathābalaṃ saṃvibhajanti, mahābhogasaṃvattanikaṃ, bhikkhave, taṃ kulaṃ tasmiṃ samaye paṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ hoti.
an5:199.5.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye sīlavante pabbajite kulaṃ upasaṅkamante manussā paripucchanti paripañhanti dhammaṃ suṇanti, mahāpaññāsaṃvattanikaṃ, bhikkhave, taṃ kulaṃ tasmiṃ samaye paṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ hoti.
an5:199.5.2: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavanto pabbajitā kulaṃ upasaṅkamanti, tattha manussā imehi pañcahi ṭhānehi bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavantī”ti.
an5:200.1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kāmaṃ manasikaroto kāmesu cittaṃ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5:200.1.4: Nekkhammaṃ kho panassa manasikaroto nekkhamme cittaṃ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5:200.1.5: Tassa taṃ cittaṃ sugataṃ subhāvitaṃ suvuṭṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ suvisaṃyuttaṃ kāmehi;
an5:200.1.6: ye ca kāmapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṃ vedanaṃ vediyati.
an5:200.2.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno byāpādaṃ manasikaroto byāpāde cittaṃ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5:200.2.2: Abyāpādaṃ kho panassa manasikaroto abyāpāde cittaṃ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5:200.2.3: Tassa taṃ cittaṃ sugataṃ subhāvitaṃ suvuṭṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ suvisaṃyuttaṃ byāpādena;
an5:200.2.4: ye ca byāpādapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṃ vedanaṃ vediyati.
an5:200.3.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vihesaṃ manasikaroto vihesāya cittaṃ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5:200.3.2: Avihesaṃ kho panassa manasikaroto avihesāya cittaṃ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5:200.3.3: Tassa taṃ cittaṃ sugataṃ subhāvitaṃ suvuṭṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ suvisaṃyuttaṃ vihesāya;
an5:200.3.4: ye ca vihesāpaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṃ vedanaṃ vediyati.
an5:200.4.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rūpaṃ manasikaroto rūpe cittaṃ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5:200.4.2: Arūpaṃ kho panassa manasikaroto arūpe cittaṃ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5:200.4.3: Tassa taṃ cittaṃ sugataṃ subhāvitaṃ suvuṭṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ suvisaṃyuttaṃ rūpehi;
an5:200.4.4: ye ca rūpapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṃ vedanaṃ vediyati.
an5:200.5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkāyaṃ manasikaroto sakkāye cittaṃ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati.
an5:200.5.2: Sakkāyanirodhaṃ kho panassa manasikaroto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṃ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati.
an5:200.5.3: Tassa taṃ cittaṃ sugataṃ subhāvitaṃ suvuṭṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ suvisaṃyuttaṃ sakkāyena;
an5:200.5.4: ye ca sakkāyapaccayā uppajjanti āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, mutto so tehi, na so taṃ vedanaṃ vediyati.
an5:200.6.1: Tassa kāmanandīpi nānuseti, byāpādanandīpi nānuseti, vihesānandīpi nānuseti, rūpanandīpi nānuseti, sakkāyanandīpi nānuseti so kāmanandiyāpi ananusayā, byāpādanandiyāpi ananusayā, vihesānandiyāpi ananusayā, rūpanandiyāpi ananusayā, sakkāyanandiyāpi ananusayā.
an5:200.6.2: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niranusayo, acchecchi taṇhaṃ, vivattayi saṃyojanaṃ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassa.
an5:200.6.3: Imā kho, bhikkhave, pañca nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo”ti.
an5:201.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kimilāyaṃ viharati veḷuvane.
an5:201.1.2: Atha kho āyasmā kimilo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā kimilo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5:201.1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti?
an5:201.1.4: “Idha, kimila, tathāgate parinibbute bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo satthari agāravā viharanti appatissā, dhamme agāravā viharanti appatissā, saṃghe agāravā viharanti appatissā, sikkhāya agāravā viharanti appatissā, aññamaññaṃ agāravā viharanti appatissā.
an5:201.1.5: Ayaṃ kho, kimila, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti.
an5:201.2.1: “Ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti?
an5:201.2.2: “Idha, kimila, tathāgate parinibbute bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo satthari sagāravā viharanti sappatissā, dhamme sagāravā viharanti sappatissā, saṅghe sagāravā viharanti sappatissā, sikkhāya sagāravā viharanti sappatissā, aññamaññaṃ sagāravā viharanti sappatissā.
an5:201.2.3: Ayaṃ kho, kimila, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko hotī”ti.
an5:202.1.3: Assutaṃ suṇāti, sutaṃ pariyodāpeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karoti, cittamassa pasīdati.
an5:202.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā dhammassavane”ti.
an5:203.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅgantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an5:203.2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅgantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an5:203.2.4: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa.
an5:203.3.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā”ti.
an5:205.1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati.
an5:205.1.4: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati, tassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5:205.1.5: Yassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṃ paṭhamo cetokhilo.
an5:205.2.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme kaṅkhati …pe…
an5:205.2.4: sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto.
an5:205.2.5: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto, tassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5:205.2.6: Yassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṃ pañcamo cetokhilo.
an5:206.1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
an5:206.1.4: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho, tassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5:206.1.5: Yassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṃ paṭhamo cetasovinibandho.
an5:206.2.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye avītarāgo hoti …pe…
an5:206.2.3: yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati …pe…
an5:206.2.4: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati: ‘imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti.
an5:206.2.5: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati: ‘imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti, tassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
an5:206.2.6: Yassa cittaṃ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, ayaṃ pañcamo cetasovinibandho.
an5:207.1.3: Khuddaṃ paṭihanati, pipāsaṃ paṭivineti, vātaṃ anulometi, vatthiṃ sodheti, āmāvasesaṃ pāceti.
an5:207.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā yāguyā”ti.
an5:208.1.3: Acakkhussaṃ, mukhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo na visujjhanti, pittaṃ semhaṃ bhattaṃ pariyonandhati, bhattamassa nacchādeti.
an5:208.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dantakaṭṭhassa akhādane.
an5:208.2.3: Cakkhussaṃ, mukhaṃ na duggandhaṃ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo visujjhanti, pittaṃ semhaṃ bhattaṃ na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chādeti.
an5:208.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā dantakaṭṭhassa khādane”ti.
an5:209.1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa.
an5:209.1.3: Attanāpi tasmiṃ sare sārajjati, parepi tasmiṃ sare sārajjanti, gahapatikāpi ujjhāyanti:
an5:209.1.4: ‘yatheva mayaṃ gāyāma, evamevaṃ kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā gāyantī’ti, sarakuttimpi nikāmayamānassa samādhissa bhaṅgo hoti, pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati.
an5:209.1.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṃ bhaṇantassā”ti.
an5:210.1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato.
an5:210.1.3: Dukkhaṃ supati, dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhati, pāpakaṃ supinaṃ passati, devatā na rakkhanti, asuci muccati.
an5:210.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato.
an5:210.2.1: Pañcime, bhikkhave, ānisaṃsā upaṭṭhitassatissa sampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato.
an5:210.2.3: Sukhaṃ supati, sukhaṃ paṭibujjhati, na pāpakaṃ supinaṃ passati, devatā rakkhanti, asuci na muccati.
an5:210.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā upaṭṭhitassatissa sampajānassa niddaṃ okkamayato”ti.
an5:211.1.1: “Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosakaparibhāsako ariyūpavādī sabrahmacārīnaṃ, tassa pañca ādīnavā pāṭikaṅkhā.
an5:211.1.3: Pārājiko vā hoti chinnaparipantho, aññataraṃ vā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, bāḷhaṃ vā rogātaṅkaṃ phusati, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5:211.1.4: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosakaparibhāsako ariyūpavādī sabrahmacārīnaṃ, tassa ime pañca ādīnavā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
an5:212.1.1: “Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako, tassa pañca ādīnavā pāṭikaṅkhā.
an5:212.1.3: Anadhigataṃ nādhigacchati, adhigatā parihāyati, pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5:212.1.4: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako, tassa ime pañca ādīnavā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
an5:213.1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno pamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahatiṃ bhogajāniṃ nigacchati.
an5:213.1.4: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5:213.2.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5:213.2.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5:213.3.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṃ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ, yadi gahapatiparisaṃ, yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—avisārado upasaṅkamati maṅkubhūto.
an5:213.3.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5:213.4.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti.
an5:213.4.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5:213.5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5:213.5.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5:213.5.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5:213.6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati.
an5:213.6.4: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5:213.7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5:213.7.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5:213.8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṃ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ, yadi gahapatiparisaṃ, yadi samaṇaparisaṃ—visārado upasaṅkamati amaṅkubhūto.
an5:213.8.2: Ayaṃ bhikkhave, tatiyo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5:213.9.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti.
an5:213.9.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5:213.10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5:213.10.2: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5:213.10.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”ti.
an5:214.1.3: Musā bhaṇati, pisuṇaṃ bhaṇati, pharusaṃ bhaṇati, samphappalāpaṃ bhaṇati, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5:214.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā bahubhāṇismiṃ puggale.
an5:214.2.3: Na musā bhaṇati, na pisuṇaṃ bhaṇati, na pharusaṃ bhaṇati, na samphappalāpaṃ bhaṇati, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5:214.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā mantabhāṇismiṃ puggale”ti.
an5:215.1.3: Bahuno janassa appiyo hoti amanāpo, verabahulo ca hoti, vajjabahulo ca, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5:215.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā akkhantiyā.
an5:215.2.3: Bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo, na verabahulo hoti, na vajjabahulo, asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5:215.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā khantiyā”ti.
an5:216.1.3: Bahuno janassa appiyo hoti amanāpo, luddo ca hoti, vippaṭisārī ca, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5:216.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā akkhantiyā.
an5:216.2.3: Bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo, aluddo ca hoti, avippaṭisārī ca, asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5:216.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā khantiyā”ti.
an5:217.1.7: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5:217.1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā apāsādike.
an5:217.2.7: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5:217.2.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā pāsādike”ti.
an5:218.1.3: Appasannā nappasīdanti, pasannānañca ekaccānaṃ aññathattaṃ hoti, satthusāsanaṃ akataṃ hoti, pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati, cittamassa nappasīdati.
an5:218.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā apāsādike.
an5:218.2.3: Appasannā pasīdanti, pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvo hoti, satthusāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti, pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati, cittamassa pasīdati.
an5:218.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā pāsādike”ti.
an5:219.1.3: Acakkhusso, dubbaṇṇakaraṇo, dubbalakaraṇo, saṅgaṇikāpavaḍḍhano, tiracchānakathāpavattaniko hoti.
an5:219.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā aggismin”ti.
an5:220.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā madhurāyan”ti.
an5:221.1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā dīghacārikaṃ anavatthacārikaṃ anuyuttassa viharato.
an5:221.1.3: Assutaṃ na suṇāti, sutaṃ na pariyodāpeti, sutenekaccena avisārado hoti, gāḷhaṃ rogātaṅkaṃ phusati, na ca mittavā hoti.
an5:221.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dīghacārikaṃ anavatthacārikaṃ anuyuttassa viharato.
an5:221.2.3: Assutaṃ suṇāti, sutaṃ pariyodāpeti, sutenekaccena visārado hoti, na gāḷhaṃ rogātaṅkaṃ phusati, mittavā ca hoti.
an5:221.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā samavatthacāre”ti.
an5:222.1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā dīghacārikaṃ anavatthacārikaṃ anuyuttassa viharato.
an5:222.1.3: Anadhigataṃ nādhigacchati, adhigatā parihāyati, adhigatenekaccena avisārado hoti, gāḷhaṃ rogātaṅkaṃ phusati, na ca mittavā hoti.
an5:222.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dīghacārikaṃ anavatthacārikaṃ anuyuttassa viharato.
an5:222.2.3: Anadhigataṃ adhigacchati, adhigatā na parihāyati, adhigatenekaccena visārado hoti, na gāḷhaṃ rogātaṅkaṃ phusati, mittavā ca hoti.
an5:222.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā samavatthacāre”ti.
an5:223.1.3: Bahubhaṇḍo hoti bahubhaṇḍasannicayo, bahubhesajjo hoti bahubhesajjasannicayo, bahukicco hoti bahukaraṇīyo byatto kiṅkaraṇīyesu, saṃsaṭṭho viharati gahaṭṭhapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena, tamhā ca āvāsā pakkamanto sāpekkho pakkamati.
an5:223.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā atinivāse.
an5:223.2.3: Na bahubhaṇḍo hoti na bahubhaṇḍasannicayo, na bahubhesajjo hoti na bahubhesajjasannicayo, na bahukicco hoti na bahukaraṇīyo na byatto kiṅkaraṇīyesu, asaṃsaṭṭho viharati gahaṭṭhapabbajitehi ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena, tamhā ca āvāsā pakkamanto anapekkho pakkamati.
an5:223.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā samavatthavāse”ti.
an5:224.1.3: Āvāsamaccharī hoti, kulamaccharī hoti, lābhamaccharī hoti, vaṇṇamaccharī hoti, dhammamaccharī hoti.
an5:224.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā atinivāse.
an5:224.2.3: Na āvāsamaccharī hoti, na kulamaccharī hoti, na lābhamaccharī hoti, na vaṇṇamaccharī hoti, na dhammamaccharī hoti.
an5:224.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā samavatthavāse”ti.
an5:225.1.3: Anāmantacāre āpajjati, raho nisajjāya āpajjati, paṭicchanne āsane āpajjati, mātugāmassa uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desento āpajjati, kāmasaṅkappabahulo viharati.
an5:225.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā kulūpake”ti.
an5:226.1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā kulūpakassa bhikkhuno ativelaṃ kulesu saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato.
an5:226.1.7: otiṇṇacittassetaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ: ‘anabhirato vā brahmacariyaṃ carissati aññataraṃ vā saṅkiliṭṭhaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjissati sikkhaṃ vā paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissati’.
an5:226.1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā kulūpakassa bhikkhuno ativelaṃ kulesu saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato”ti.
an5:227.1.3: Aggisādhāraṇā bhogā, udakasādhāraṇā bhogā, rājasādhāraṇā bhogā, corasādhāraṇā bhogā, appiyehi dāyādehi sādhāraṇā bhogā.
an5:227.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā bhogesu.
an5:227.2.3: Bhoge nissāya attānaṃ sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṃ pariharati, mātāpitaro sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṃ pariharati, puttadāradāsakammakaraporise sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṃ pariharati, mittāmacce sukheti pīṇeti sammā sukhaṃ pariharati, samaṇabrāhmaṇesu uddhaggikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti sovaggikaṃ sukhavipākaṃ saggasaṃvattanikaṃ.
an5:227.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā bhogesū”ti.
an5:228.1.3: Ye te atithī pāhunā, te na kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5:228.1.4: yā tā balipaṭiggāhikā devatā, tā na kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5:228.1.5: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekabhattikā rattūparatā viratā vikālabhojanā, te na kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5:228.1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā ussūrabhatte kule.
an5:228.2.3: Ye te atithī pāhunā, te kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5:228.2.4: yā tā balipaṭiggāhikā devatā, tā kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5:228.2.5: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekabhattikā rattūparatā viratā vikālabhojanā, te kālena paṭipūjenti;
an5:228.2.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā samayabhatte kule”ti.
an5:229.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā kaṇhasappe.
an5:229.2.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcime ādīnavā mātugāme.
an5:229.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā mātugāme”ti.
an5:230.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā kaṇhasappe.
an5:230.2.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcime ādīnavā mātugāme.
an5:230.2.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā mātugāme”ti.
an5:231.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hoti.
an5:231.1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu abhāvanīyo hoti.
an5:231.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu bhāvanīyo hoti.
an5:231.2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu bhāvanīyo hotī”ti.
an5:232.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca.
an5:232.1.3: Sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
an5:232.1.4: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti, tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
an5:232.1.5: kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an5:232.1.6: catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī;
an5:232.1.7: āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an5:232.1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cā”ti.
an5:233.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu āvāsaṃ sobheti.
an5:233.1.5: kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā;
an5:233.1.6: paṭibalo hoti upasaṅkamante dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṃ samādapetuṃ samuttejetuṃ sampahaṃsetuṃ;
an5:233.1.7: catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an5:233.1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu āvāsaṃ sobhetī”ti.
an5:234.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu āvāsassa bahūpakāro hoti.
an5:234.1.6: mahā kho pana bhikkhusaṅgho abhikkanto nānāverajjakā bhikkhū gihīnaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āroceti:
an5:234.1.7: ‘mahā kho, āvuso, bhikkhusaṅgho abhikkanto nānāverajjakā bhikkhū, karotha puññāni, samayo puññāni kātun’ti;
an5:234.1.8: catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an5:234.1.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu āvāsassa bahūpakāro hotī”ti.
an5:235.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu gihīnaṃ anukampati.
an5:235.1.7: mahā kho pana bhikkhusaṃgho abhikkanto nānāverajjakā bhikkhū gihīnaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āroceti:
an5:235.1.8: ‘mahā kho, āvuso, bhikkhusaṃgho abhikkanto nānāverajjakā bhikkhū, karotha puññāni, samayo puññāni kātun’ti;
an5:235.1.9: yaṃ kho panassa bhojanaṃ denti lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā taṃ attanā paribhuñjati, saddhādeyyaṃ na vinipāteti.
an5:235.1.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu gihīnaṃ anukampatī”ti.
an5:236.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an5:236.1.5: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
an5:236.1.6: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
an5:236.1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an5:236.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an5:236.2.5: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
an5:236.2.6: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti;
an5:236.2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
an5:237.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato āvāsiko bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.

an5:241.1.7: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5:241.1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā duccarite.
an5:241.2.7: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5:241.2.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā sucarite”ti.
an5:244.1.7: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5:244.1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā manosucarite”ti.
an5:245.1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā duccarite.

an5:248.1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā manosucarite”ti.
an5:249.1.3: Asuci, duggandhā, sappaṭibhayā, vāḷānaṃ amanussānaṃ āvāso, bahuno janassa ārodanā—
an5:249.1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā sivathikāya.
an5:249.2.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcime ādīnavā sivathikūpame puggale.
an5:249.2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo asucinā kāyakammena samannāgato hoti;
an5:249.3.1: Tassa asucinā kāyakammena samannāgatassa, asucinā vacīkammena samannāgatassa, asucinā manokammena samannāgatassa pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5:249.4.1: Tamenaṃ asucinā kāyakammena samannāgataṃ, asucinā vacīkammena samannāgataṃ, asucinā manokammena samannāgataṃ pesalā sabrahmacārī ārakā parivajjanti.
an5:249.5.1: So asucinā kāyakammena samannāgato, asucinā vacīkammena samannāgato, asucinā manokammena samannāgato sabhāgehi puggalehi saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
an5:249.5.3: Seyyathāpi sā, bhikkhave, sivathikā vāḷānaṃ amanussānaṃ āvāso;
an5:249.6.1: Tamenaṃ asucinā kāyakammena samannāgataṃ, asucinā vacīkammena samannāgataṃ, asucinā manokammena samannāgataṃ pesalā sabrahmacārī disvā khīyadhammaṃ āpajjanti:
an5:249.6.2: ‘aho vata no dukkhaṃ ye mayaṃ evarūpehi puggalehi saddhiṃ saṃvasāmā’ti.
an5:249.6.4: Seyyathāpi sā, bhikkhave, sivathikā bahuno janassa ārodanā;
an5:249.6.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā sivathikūpame puggale”ti.
an5:250.1.3: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathārūpaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā saṅgho ukkhipati.
an5:250.1.5: ‘yo kho myāyaṃ puggalo piyo manāpo so saṅghena ukkhitto’ti.
an5:250.1.7: Bhikkhūsu appasādabahulo samāno aññe bhikkhū na bhajati.
an5:250.1.8: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṃ na suṇāti.
an5:250.2.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathārūpaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā saṅgho ante nisīdāpeti.
an5:250.2.3: ‘yo kho myāyaṃ puggalo piyo manāpo so saṅghena ante nisīdāpito’ti.
an5:250.2.5: Bhikkhūsu appasādabahulo samāno aññe bhikkhū na bhajati.
an5:250.2.6: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṃ na suṇāti.
an5:250.3.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so disāpakkanto hoti …pe… so vibbhanto hoti …pe… so kālaṅkato hoti.
an5:250.3.3: ‘yo kho myāyaṃ puggalo piyo manāpo so kālaṅkato’ti.
an5:250.3.5: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṃ na suṇāti.
an5:250.3.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā puggalappasāde”ti.
an5:251.1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti;
an5:251.1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabban”ti.
an5:252.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nissayo dātabbo.
an5:252.1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti …pe… asekhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti.
an5:253.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
an5:253.1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti; asekhena samādhikkhandhena … asekhena paññākkhandhena … asekhena vimuttikkhandhena … asekhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti.
an5:253.1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti.
an5:254.1.5: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ macchariyānaṃ etaṃ paṭikuṭṭhaṃ, yadidaṃ dhammamacchariyan”ti.
an5:255.1.1: “Pañcannaṃ, bhikkhave, macchariyānaṃ pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṃ vussati.
an5:255.1.4: kulamacchariyassa … lābhamacchariyassa … vaṇṇamacchariyassa … dhammamacchariyassa pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṃ vussati.
an5:255.1.5: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ macchariyānaṃ pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti.
an5:256.1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
an5:256.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhamme appahāya abhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
an5:256.2.1: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
an5:256.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharitun”ti.
an5:257-263.1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe… abhabbo tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ … abhabbo catutthaṃ jhānaṃ … abhabbo sotāpattiphalaṃ … abhabbo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ … abhabbo anāgāmiphalaṃ … abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an5:257-263.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an5:257-263.2.1: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …pe… bhabbo tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ … bhabbo catutthaṃ jhānaṃ … bhabbo sotāpattiphalaṃ … bhabbo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ … bhabbo anāgāmiphalaṃ … bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an5:257-263.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
an5:264.1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
an5:264.1.3: Āvāsamacchariyaṃ, kulamacchariyaṃ, lābhamacchariyaṃ, vaṇṇamacchariyaṃ, akataññutaṃ akataveditaṃ.
an5:264.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhamme appahāya abhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
an5:264.2.1: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ.
an5:264.2.3: Āvāsamacchariyaṃ, kulamacchariyaṃ, lābhamacchariyaṃ, vaṇṇamacchariyaṃ, akataññutaṃ akataveditaṃ.
an5:264.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhamme pahāya bhabbo paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharitun”ti.
an5:265-271.1.1: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ … tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ … sotāpattiphalaṃ … sakadāgāmiphalaṃ … anāgāmiphalaṃ … arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an5:265-271.1.3: Āvāsamacchariyaṃ, kulamacchariyaṃ, lābhamacchariyaṃ, vaṇṇamacchariyaṃ, akataññutaṃ akataveditaṃ.
an5:265-271.1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an5:265-271.2.1: Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ … tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ … sotāpattiphalaṃ … sakadāgāmiphalaṃ … anāgāmiphalaṃ … arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an5:265-271.2.3: Āvāsamacchariyaṃ, kulamacchariyaṃ, lābhamacchariyaṃ, vaṇṇamacchariyaṃ, akataññutaṃ akataveditaṃ.
an5:265-271.2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
an5:272.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako na sammannitabbo.
an5:272.1.3: Chandāgatiṃ gacchati, dosāgatiṃ gacchati, mohāgatiṃ gacchati, bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, uddiṭṭhānuddiṭṭhaṃ na jānāti.
an5:272.1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako na sammannitabbo.
an5:272.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako sammannitabbo.
an5:272.2.3: Na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, uddiṭṭhānuddiṭṭhaṃ jānāti.
an5:272.2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako sammannitabboti.
an5:272.3.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako sammato na pesetabbo …pe… sammato pesetabbo … bālo veditabbo … paṇḍito veditabbo … khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati … akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati … yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye … yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an5:272.3.3: Na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, uddiṭṭhānuddiṭṭhaṃ jānāti.
an5:272.3.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhattuddesako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
an5:273-285.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato senāsanapaññāpako na sammannitabbo …pe… paññattāpaññattaṃ na jānāti …pe… senāsanapaññāpako sammannitabbo …pe… paññattāpaññattaṃ jānāti …pe….
an5:273-285.2.1: Senāsanagāhāpako na sammannitabbo …pe… gahitāgahitaṃ na jānāti …pe… senāsanagāhāpako sammannitabbo …pe… gahitāgahitaṃ jānāti …pe….
an5:273-285.3.1: Bhaṇḍāgāriko na sammannitabbo …pe… guttāguttaṃ na jānāti … bhaṇḍāgāriko sammannitabbo …pe… guttāguttaṃ jānāti ….
an5:273-285.4.1: Cīvarapaṭiggāhako na sammannitabbo …pe… gahitāgahitaṃ na jānāti … cīvarapaṭiggāhako sammannitabbo …pe… gahitāgahitaṃ jānāti ….
an5:273-285.5.1: Cīvarabhājako na sammannitabbo …pe… bhājitābhājitaṃ na jānāti … cīvarabhājako sammannitabbo …pe… bhājitābhājitaṃ jānāti ….
an5:273-285.8.1: Khajjakabhājako na sammannitabbo …pe… bhājitābhājitaṃ na jānāti … khajjakabhājako sammannitabbo …pe… bhājitābhājitaṃ jānāti ….
an5:273-285.9.1: Appamattakavissajjako na sammannitabbo …pe… vissajjitāvissajjitaṃ na jānāti … appamattakavissajjako sammannitabbo …pe… vissajjitāvissajjitaṃ jānāti ….
an5:273-285.10.1: Sāṭiyaggāhāpako na sammannitabbo …pe… gahitāgahitaṃ na jānāti … sāṭiyaggāhāpako sammannitabbo …pe… gahitāgahitaṃ jānāti ….
an5:273-285.11.1: Pattaggāhāpako na sammannitabbo …pe… gahitāgahitaṃ na jānāti … pattaggāhāpako sammannitabbo …pe… gahitāgahitaṃ jānāti ….
an5:273-285.13.1: Sāmaṇerapesako na sammannitabbo …pe… sāmaṇerapesako sammannitabbo …pe…. Sammato na pesetabbo …pe… sammato pesetabbo …pe….
an5:273-285.15.1: Sāmaṇerapesako bālo veditabbo …pe… paṇḍito veditabbo … khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati … akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati … yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye … yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an5:273-285.15.3: Na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, pesitāpesitaṃ jānāti.
an5:273-285.15.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato sāmaṇerapesako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
an5:286.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an5:286.1.3: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, abrahmacārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī hoti.
an5:286.1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an5:286.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an5:286.2.3: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, abrahmacariyā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti.
an5:286.2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
an5:287-292.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī …pe… sikkhamānā … sāmaṇero … sāmaṇerī … upāsako … upāsikā yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ niraye.
an5:287-292.1.3: Pāṇātipātinī hoti, adinnādāyinī hoti, kāmesumicchācārinī hoti, musāvādinī hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyinī hoti.
an5:287-292.1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā upāsikā yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ niraye.
an5:287-292.2.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā upāsikā yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ sagge.
an5:287-292.2.3: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā hoti, adinnādānā paṭiviratā hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā hoti, musāvādā paṭiviratā hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā hoti.
an5:287-292.2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā upāsikā yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ sagge”ti.
an5:293.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ājīvako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an5:293.1.3: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, abrahmacārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī hoti.
an5:293.1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato ājīvako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti.
an5:294-302.1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato nigaṇṭho … muṇḍasāvako … jaṭilako … paribbājako … māgaṇḍiko … tedaṇḍiko … āruddhako … gotamako … devadhammiko yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an5:294-302.1.3: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti …pe… surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī hoti.
an5:294-302.1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato devadhammiko yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti.
an5:303.1.3: Asubhasaññā, maraṇasaññā, ādīnavasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā—
an5:303.1.4: rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime pañca dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti. (1)
an5:304.1.3: Aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, maraṇasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā—
an5:304.1.4: rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime pañca dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti. (2)
an5:305.1.3: Aniccasaññā, anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññā—
an5:305.1.4: rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime pañca dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti. (3)
an5:306.1.4: rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime pañca dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti. (4)
an5:307.1.4: rāgassa, bhikkhave, abhiññāya ime pañca dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti. (5)
an5:308-1152.1.1: “Rāgassa, bhikkhave, pariññāya … parikkhayāya … pahānāya … khayāya … vayāya … virāgāya … nirodhāya … cāgāya … paṭinissaggāya pañca dhammā bhāvetabbā.
an5:308-1152.1.2: Dosassa … mohassa … kodhassa … upanāhassa … makkhassa … paḷāsassa … issāya … macchariyassa … māyāya … sāṭheyyassa … thambhassa … sārambhassa … mānassa … atimānassa … madassa … pamādassa abhiññāya … pariññāya … parikkhayāya … pahānāya … khayāya … vayāya … virāgāya … nirodhāya … cāgāya … paṭinissaggāya pañca dhammā bhāvetabbā. (6–849.)
an5:308-1152.2.3: pamādassa, bhikkhave, paṭinissaggāya ime pañca dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti. (850)
